Name: cobalt sulfate production | cobalt sulfate | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: The process involves the treatment of cobalt hydroxide (Co(OH)2) with sulfuric acid (H2SO4) and disodium disulphite (Na2S2O5). The leached solution undergoes various precipitation steps to remove impurities. Evaporation and crystallization followed by filtration and  drying will produce battery-grade CoSO4 crystals.;Reference:;Dai, Q., C., K., & Elgowainy, A. (2018). Cobalt life cycle analysis update for the greet model (Tech. Rep.). Argonne, IL (United States): Argonne National Lab.(ANL).
